tika-abh06t0:0_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
tika-abh06t0:10_0: and the gods of the Thirty-Three,
tika-abh06t0:11_0: His retinue is teaching Dhamma in the castle of the gods.
tika-abh06t0:13_0: make it for the purpose of crossing,
tika-abh06t0:14_0: They use speech like honey with honey, mediam;
tika-abh06t0:16_0: a box, a deceiver, with unwell,
tika-abh06t0:17_0: and the monks in line with the teachings.
tika-abh06t0:1_0: Of all those who are virtuous,
tika-abh06t0:20_0: like a lake clear of mud, the water in the sky.
tika-abh06t0:22_0: They’re expert in the teachings, dedicated to their hands,
tika-abh06t0:23_0: I have listened to the true teaching, serene.
tika-abh06t0:2_0: Discussion of the color of ties,
tika-abh06t0:4_0: Don’t perform the state of grace, the Realized Ones.
tika-abh06t0:5_0: bowing down at the Buddha’s teaching, and there’s a single teaching.
tika-abh06t0:8_0: And he is sitting in the cool breeze, for the king.
